description:
Pirari Festival is nearly here, and the script for the play Lion and everyone in Class S is going to perform is complete. Everyone`s busy getting everything ready and rehearsing, but Lion, who`s playing the leading role, just can`t seem to get any better at playing her role, no matter how much she practices. Nobody can figure out what to do until they stumble upon an unlikely solution. Now that the day of the festival is finally here, will Lion and her class make their play a success?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les poussins sont faits pour chanter
Songs Change with Hinas, and Hinas Change with Song
Uta wa Hina ni Tsure Hina wa Uta ni Tsure
歌はヒナにつれヒナは歌につれ
히나에 따라 노래도 변하고, 노래에 따라 히나도 변하고
